data.text: I stayed for 6 nights in September and it was a very good experience, I recommend it for sure, Good equipment, an excellent location, a nice view in front of the beach, a rich breakfast, and a friendly adorable staff.
data.title: Very good experience.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest

Thank you for such a wonderful comment! We are very pleased to hear that you are satisfied with our staff, service, and, of course, location! We look forward to seeing you again!

Best regards, Pearly hotel.
owner_response.author: PEARLY HOTEL

data.text:
Excellent Service, Beautiful, clean Hotel
A wonderful family hotel and spa, the location is perfect, easy access to shops, food , main roads! The staff are very friendly and helpful. The spa is excellent
data.title: Family Break by the sea

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest,

Thank you for your kind comment. We are happy to hear that we have met your expectations. We look forward to welcoming you and your family back to our hotel.

Kind Regards, Pearly hotel.
owner_response.author: PEARLY HOTEL

data.text:
The pearly hotel is highly recommended. We booked 2 rooms for a family of four .The hotel is very clean with excellent housekeeping provided by Seaham. Breakfast could have been better but overall it was good. The hotel offers a lovely spa with some free facilities.
  It's conveniently located across the ferman beach . The landmarks are in close proximity and old city is about 30 mins away . There are very good quality restaurants within walking distance.
We thoroughly enjoyed our time in antalya
data.title: A GREAT STAY

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest,

Thank you for such a detailed review of your vacation. Your opinion is very important to us, and we will take your opinion about the breakfasts into consideration. We will definitely see you again!

Kind regards, Pearly hotel.
owner_response.author: PEARLY HOTEL

data.text:
Very well located, simple hotel.
Small room which is ok for 3-4 days but not more than that.
Gym is simple but ok, breakfast is included but pretty simple, too, without any choice. 4 days in a row the very same.
The spa downstairs is great, with extremely good sauna/steam bath/peeling/massage procedure, professionally made amd in a great atmosphere.
The first day the was a cat constantly trying to get into our room via the balcony (therefore not possible to get fresh air) miaowing loudly all night, attracting attention of pretty much all guests. It came over from another room, where the reception staff gave the cat shelter. Nice to do, but with negative side effects for the guestsâ€¦
data.title: Well located, very simple, ok for a short stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest 

First of all, we thank you for such a detailed comment about your stay at the hotel. Every guest's opinion is very important to us, and we will be sure to communicate these details to the appropriate management. We look forward to welcoming you back.

 With Regards, Pearly hotel
owner_response.author: PEARLY HOTEL

data.text: Scoring a mere 3/10, this hotel is a letdown. Front desk service is lackluster, failing even to greet guests, and disregards issues unless significantly disruptive. The sauna underperforms, failing to heat beyond 90 degrees. Bathrooms are hazardous, with a 187cm high metal shower cabinet causing me multiple injuries and a fragile toiletries shelf collapsing under a towel's weight. The bed runner, intended for cleanliness, was neglected. Breakfast disappoints, with limited bread and egg options, substandard pancakes and burek, and an excess of sweet spreads. Electrical issues caused fan noise and flickering service lights. Despite acceptable room service, I discourage recommending this hotel.
data.title: Not recommended. Bad service, hazardz, poor breakfast.
